QuestData.Title: The House of the Chosen
QuestData.Description:
<Draka gestures to the sky.>
Look there, mortal. That is the necropolis of Margrave Krexus, who leads the House of the Chosen. It is my honor to serve as his baroness.
Let us ride to our fortress. There we can gather our strength and make ready for the battle to come.
QuestData.LogDescription: Head to the House of the Chosen with Draka.
QuestData.RewardText:
The Chosen are all that remains of what the Primus stood for.
We are the last hope of this realm.

Objectives.Objective: Enter the House of the Chosen
